Install
```````
.. code:: bash
`[sudo] pip install public`
Usage
`````
.. code:: python
>>> from public import public
>>> @public # decorator
>>> public(*objects) # function
Examples
````````
.. code:: python
>>> @public
def func(): pass
>>> @public
class CLS: pass
>>> print(__all__)
['CLS',func']
>>> public("name")
>>> public("name1","name2")
>>> print(__all__)
['name','name1','name2']
